name: Pasinko
description:
A ship themed pachinko game made for Ludum Dare 49.

Shoot cannon balls into the buckets to score points. Each shot costs one point. But watch out - if you hit the steering wheel, the ship will start to turn! Whose bright idea was it to put pachinko on a boat anyway?

Game by Tanuki Frog:

  • David - Level Design
  • Gigi - Programming/VFX
  • James - Programming
  • Janel - Art
  • Justin - Programming/Design
  • Paige - Art
  • Phi - Writing/Art
  • Tina - Audio
